html: Alternatively, if there is a deal and the Government loses a meaningful vote under section 13(1) the agreement falls – but Brexit proceeds. So all the government has to do is hold its nerve and Brexit proceeds.

text:
[2/2]
... and he never compromised his opinions.  He had an extraordinary grasp of post war political history. The last parliamentarian to serve with Winston Churchill. One of the first economic Thatcherites and Euro Sceptics. His work will carry on.

html: [1/2] Sir Peter Tapsell was my friend and neighbour for thirty five years. He leant me the representation of the beautiful town of Horncastle for 14 years. Peter was a political giant and Father of the House. Despite his undoubted abilities, he never took ministerial office...
text:
[1/2]
Sir Peter Tapsell was my friend and neighbour for thirty five years.  He leant me the representation of the beautiful town of Horncastle for 14 years. Peter was a political giant and Father of the House. 
Despite his undoubted abilities, he never took ministerial office...
